sentences.sContent: Also good for seed's long-term preservation. 7. There is a top dosage limit for AITC to fumigate different crop seeds.
sentences.sContent_eng: Also good for seed's long-term preservation. 7. There is a top dosage limit for AITC to fumigate different crop seeds.
sentences.sCn: 辣根精油活性成分AITC对不同的作物种子熏蒸时，其使用浓度有一定的限制。

sentences.sContent: Heat the vinegar, close doors and windows, fumigate in the room from time to time, which can effectively kill the flu virus.
sentences.sContent_eng: Heat the vinegar, close doors and windows, fumigate in the room from time to time, which can effectively kill the flu virus.
sentences.sCn: 把陈醋加热，关上门窗，隔一段时间在房间里熏蒸一次，可有效杀除感冒等病毒。

remMethod.val: fum ( = fume， 烟) + igate (用…的) → 用烟消毒 → 熏蒸 (消毒)

trans.tranOther: to remove disease,  bacteria  , insects etc from somewhere using chemicals, smoke, or gas
